resources.string: Rick and Morty ( Rick and Morty ) is an American adult animated series created by Justin Roiland and Dan Harmon , airing from the December 2 , 2013on Cartoon Network , in the Late Night Adult Swim installment . The series follows the misadventures of Rick Sanchez , a cynical and whimsical scientist , and his disturbed and easily influenced grandson, Morty Smith, who divide their time between a domestic life and interdimensional adventures. Roiland doubles as the main characters, while Chris Parnell , Spencer Grammer and Sarah Chalke lend their voices to the rest of the family
